title: Cannot build with panic = "abort" and extern crate test
body:
A blank project with the following `Cargo.toml` and `src/main.rs`:
```toml
[package]
name = "rust10"
version = "0.1.0"
authors = ["carado <carado@savhon.org>"]
edition = "2018"

[profile.dev]
panic = "abort"

[dependencies]
```
```rust
#![feature(test)]

extern crate test;

fn main() {
	test::black_box(1); // requires `extern crate test`
}
```
Fails to build with the following error:
```
carado@ram:~/tmp/rust10 $ rustc --version
rustc 1.37.0-nightly (4edff843d 2019-06-16)
carado@ram:~/tmp/rust10 $ cargo --version
cargo 1.37.0-nightly (545f35425 2019-05-23)
carado@ram:~/tmp/rust10 $ cargo clean
carado@ram:~/tmp/rust10 $ cargo build --verbose
   Compiling rust10 v0.1.0 (/home/carado/tmp/rust10)
     Running `rustc --edition=2018 --crate-name rust10 src/main.rs --color always --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C panic=abort -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=2fce38662e2f2102 -C extra-filename=-2fce38662e2f2102 --out-dir /home/carado/tmp/rust10/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/home/carado/tmp/rust10/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/home/carado/tmp/rust10/target/debug/deps`
error: the linked panic runtime `panic_unwind` is not compiled with this crate's panic strategy `abort`

error: aborting due to previous error

error: Could not compile `rust10`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --edition=2018 --crate-name rust10 src/main.rs --color always --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C panic=abort -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=2fce38662e2f2102 -C extra-filename=-2fce38662e2f2102 --out-dir /home/carado/tmp/rust10/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/home/carado/tmp/rust10/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/home/carado/tmp/rust10/target/debug/deps` (exit code: 1)
```
